alert.note: Alert for Pima (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 28 at 6:57PM MST until July 28 at 7:15PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM MST FOR NORTHEASTERN PIMA COUNTY... At 657 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Tucson Estates, or 13 miles west of Tucson, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Tucson, Sahuarita, Davis-Monthan Air Force Base, Casas Adobes, Drexel Heights, Flowing Wells, South Tucson, Pascua Pueblo Yaqui Reservation, East Sahuarita, Summit, Tucson Estates, Valencia West, Tucson International Airport, Saguaro National Park West, Catalina Foothills, San Xavier Mission and Ryan AirField. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
